pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 24, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 24, 2017:

Anjou, Quebec

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Lufa Farms rooftop farm.

10680 Boulevard Parkway
Anjou, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media must arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

Boisbriand, Quebec

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Kinova Robotics and participate in a robotics technology demonstration. A media availability will follow.

4333 Boulevard de la Grande-All√©e
Boisbriand, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity for visit to production lab
  • Open coverage for technology demonstration
  • Open coverage for media availability, expected to begin at 11:50 a.m.
  • Media must arrive no later than 10:45 a.m. and present themselves to main entrance

Ottawa, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Centre Block, Room 237-C
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
